test_search_on_fields_in_belongs_to_association()

Testing the association indexing with belongs_to:

class Book < ActiveRecord::Base 

  belongs_to :category
  acts_as_solr :include => [:category]

end

Note that some of the search terms below are from the ‘categories’ table, but get indexed as being a part of Book
